body_html:
@andrewharp I have a slightly more complex architecture in TF which is ConvNet + LSTMs with visual attention. Similar to Im2Text rather than the classifier models. Say I checkpoint my graph and rewrite ClassifierActivity as instructed in your previous comment, will I be able to make it work on an Android device? If not, what other changes might I have to make?

Also,

if your interaction with TensorFlow is not too complex

could you explain how complex is "too complex" and what issues might arise because of it?

Thanks.
body_text:
@andrewharp I have a slightly more complex architecture in TF which is ConvNet + LSTMs with visual attention. Similar to Im2Text rather than the classifier models. Say I checkpoint my graph and rewrite ClassifierActivity as instructed in your previous comment, will I be able to make it work on an Android device? If not, what other changes might I have to make?
Also,

if your interaction with TensorFlow is not too complex

could you explain how complex is "too complex" and what issues might arise because of it?
Thanks.
body:
@andrewharp I have a slightly more complex architecture in TF which is ConvNet + LSTMs with visual attention. Similar to [Im2Text](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/im2txt) rather than the classifier models. Say I checkpoint my graph and rewrite ClassifierActivity as instructed in your previous comment, will I be able to make it work on an Android device? If not, what other changes might I have to make?

Also,

>  if your interaction with TensorFlow is not too complex

could you explain how complex is "too complex" and what issues might arise because of it?

Thanks.
